list-item.p: Patients taking short or low-dose steroid therapy (<20 mg/day of prednisolone or equivalent) or inhaled or topical steroids
Patients taking methotrexate at doses of ≤0.4 mg/kg/week or azathioprine at doses of ≤3 mg/kg/day
Travelers with autoimmune disease who are not being treated with immunosuppressive or immunomodulatory drugs, although definitive data are lacking
